Effect.PerformanceRealization: %list(i,r,and)% reminisced about the times %list(i,r,we/they)% used to hang
%r% said %prons(r,he/she)% couldn't remember any good times with %i%
%list(i,r,and)% talked about the last time %list(i,r,we/they)% hung out
%list(i,r,and)% shared cool memories
%i% tried to get all nostalgic on %r%
%i% tried to flashback on %r% and %prons(r,he/she)% told %pron(i,him/her)% to shut up
%list(i,r,and)% relived good memories
%i% and %r% talked about %rp% cool past
%i% talked about %pron(i,his/her)% past with %r%
%r% failed to appreciated %ip% awesomeness
%i% commiserated with %r%
%i% reminded %r% of romantic times
%i% was a little too into reminiscing with %r%
%i% spread the word about %pron(i,his/her)% coolness
%i% could still remember that thing that happened like five minutes ago
%i% talked to %r% about memories that didn't happen
%i% tried to woo %r% the same way %pron(i,he/she)% wood %o% and %rs% %pron(r,was/were)% not amused
%list(i,r,and)% laughed about that rude thing %is% did to %o%
%i% reminisced to %op% friend %r% about picking on %pron(o,him/her)%
%i% reminisced to %r% about embarassing %o%
%i% accidently admitted %prons(i,he/she)% was cheating on %r%
%i% hinted that %rs% would be like, haunted or something
%o% just couldn't get through to %r%, but chatted with the Ghost of Christmas Present instead
%i% remembered good times dating %r%
%i% remembered good times dating %r% but %rs% remembered them differently
%i% annoyed %r% by talking about when %list(i,r,we/they)% used to date
%i% wanted to reminisce about dating with %r%, but %rs% wouldn't let go of the whole cheating thing
%i% totally set %r% up with a reminisce about when %pron(r,he/she)% cheated

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, remember back in the day when we used to hang out and stuff?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah... good times, huh?
Hey, we should really hang out more often.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Cool! I'm down.
Hey %r%... we used to have some good times, huh?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... they were times, all right.
Good times, not so much.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %gender(i,dude,girl)%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just thinking about the last time we hung out. %random(Remember that crazy thing with the thing?,Remember how awesome that was?,Didn't we have good times?,I can't believe we got away with that.,I totally want to blog about it.,I totally posted a bunch of photos online from that.,Can you send me that video you took?)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(OMG totally,Definitely,No doubt)%. You were so %if(0,decked out)elseif(2,on your game)elseif(3,crazy)else(cool)%. Definitely good times.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %buddy%, what's happening?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just thinking about that time when %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hellz yeah. We've been through some good times together.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know it.
%r%... I know we've had issues, but remember back in like eighth grade? We used to have fun then, right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(i,Man,Sweetheart)%, in eighth grade I mostly remember you %if(1,flirting with anything that moved)elseif(2,playing with your Space Command action figures)elseif(3,being a total douche)elseif(4,going on about how much better than everyone you were)else(being a loser)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're a monster.
%greeting%... %gender(r,man,hey)%, we used to have some good times, didn't we?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: The only good times I've had with you are the moments you've stopped talking.
Like this one.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, do you remember when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: OMG, like it was yesterday.
Wait, when was that? Was it yesterday?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Eh, I don't remember. Anyway good times, am I right?
Hey %buddy%! I was just thinking about that time when %toc1%. That was totally cool.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I suppose so. But you know, so many cool things happen to me I don't really keep track of them all.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're the man, %gender(r,man,girl)%.
What up, %r%. Hey, did I ever tell you about that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Only like a million times.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hehe, sorry.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's all good. Just let me know when the movie comes out, %buddy%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%. Hey, you remember when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not really.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Whatever. I guess I wouldn't expect someone as uncool as you to appreciate something like that.
%greeting%, %r%. So I heard that %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. I mean, that's how it's been going around, anyway.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That sucks %buddy%. We should hang out later and do something cool.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sweet! Later.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting%, %sweetie%. What's on your mind?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was justing thinking about that time %toc1%.

Instantiation.name: Reminisce - I likes R more Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %buddy%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, it's you. What do you want?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just thinking about that time when %toc1%. Remember?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Can you step out of my breathing space, please?

Instantiation.name: Reminisce - I just wants to talk Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%. So I don't know if you're aware, but recently %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I heard about that! That was totally cool. You always do everything, like awesome and stuff.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, I'm sorry. I wasn't looking for your opinion. I just wanted to spread the word. Toodles!
%greeting% %r%, remember when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, that wasn't that long ago.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well it was still %positiveadj% right?
Hey, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just thinking about that time when we totally did something cool together.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah! Wait...
Was there a time we did something cool together?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Maybe not. We should definitely do something cool together later.
High Five!

Instantiation.name: Reminisce - HighRom (i/r) Low Rom (r/i) SFDB Romantic (i/o) Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. Funny seeing you here.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not that funny. What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nothing, nothing. Just thinking about that time when %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah? So?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, I was just thinking that maybe one day... I could do that for you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What kinda cheap, easy trick do you think I am? I don't want your recycled techniques!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I didn't mean it li-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Get outta my face.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! Remember that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, that was hilarious! Poor %o% though...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nah, it's okay. %gender(o,He,She)% had it coming.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I guess so. Good times...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%!!! Oh man, my sides hurt everytime I think about it!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's so funny?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh god, oh god. Don't you remember when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. All too well... How could you do that to %o%!? And how dare you brag about it to me!
%o% is my friend and that's much more than I can say about you!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Erm... Sorry?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%. Man, I can't stand that %o%...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Tell me about it.
Hey, remember that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh god, I totally do! Man, that was so embarassing. You really let %o% have it!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know! You should totally join me next time. I feel a practical joke coming on!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Totally! Text me!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's up %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I have to tell you about earlier.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What happened?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You did *what* to %pron(o,him/her)%? I'm going to kill that %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Wait I didn't mean....

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's so over between us!

Instantiation.name: Reminisce - (SS8 Act-1) Marley Reminisces with Scrooge about his ex-lover.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Tell me, do you remember fair %o%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, of course I do, we dated. But now we're split. You know that, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh! Captive, bound, and double ironed!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Heh, yeah. That's pretty much how it felt like every day I was with %pron(o,him/her)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hear me! My time is nearly gone! Soon, you shall be haunted by three spirits.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I - I think I'd rather not.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look to see me no more; and look that, for your own sake, you remember what has passed between us!

Instantiation.name: Reminisce - (SS8 Act-3) Scrooge meets the ghost of Christmas Present

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Good morrow, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Aye, good morrow, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Tell me, fair %r%, do you oft think of your time spent with %o%?
LineOfDialogue.otherLine: %i%! %r%! I've been on a fantastic journey!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %o%! Why, I wish I had him here!
I'd give him a piece of my mind to feast upon, and I hope he'd have a good appetite for it!
LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Oh my, heh heh, well, fortunately for the both of us, I *am* here!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'll drink his faith for your sake and the Day's. Not for his.
LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Uhh, what's that supposed to mean, %sweetie%?
Why, this must be the second haunting I was promised!
But... where is the Ghost of Christmas Present? Unless... is that you assuming my friend's visage again, Spirit #2?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes! Well played, %o%! But beware-the scene you just witnessed between %i% and %r% truly did come to pass just moments ago.
You're gonna have your work cut out for you once you're done with the Ghost of Christmas Future!

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: I'll... I'll win her back. Just you wait and see!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Good luck.
Hey %r%... I was just thinking about the times we used to have. Remember when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. Pretty embarrassing now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Totally. It seems weird we ever dated. I'm glad we can still be friends now.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Me too, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... I was just thinking about the times we used to have. Remember when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. Pretty embarrassing now.
In fact I'm not sure why you'd even bring that up. Are you trying to get back together with me or something?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No! I mean, I... I'm just glad we can still be friends, you know?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh huh.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, I had a dream last night. You were in it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What happened?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It was like I was re-watching that time when %toc1% - remember that?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh yeah... that.
Can we talk about this later or something, %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh... Yeah, sure.

Instantiation.name: Reminisce - (Zane) Used to Date (cheater i, r) Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%. Hey, remember that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Guess so...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And all those beautiful other times we shared together...?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah... Those were nice, I guess.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ya, sometimes I miss them.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I would too, if you hadn't broken my heart to pieces like you did.
Get out of here, %pejorative%.

Instantiation.name: Reminisce - (Zane) Used to Date (cheater r, i) Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh hey %r%. I was just thinking about the good ol' days. Like when %toc1%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You mean all the great times we shared together? And the beautiful memories?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nope. Actually when you cheated on me, you %pejorative% schmuck.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh... yeah that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah. That. %pejorative%.
